meanings.definition: Match or surpass (a person or achievement), typically by imitation.
meanings.sent1: She emulates her older sister by copying everything she does.
meanings.sent2: The young artist emulates the style of the famous painter in her own work.
meanings.sent3: The robot emulates the dance moves of the human, but with a mechanical twist.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his craft emulates the unwavering commitment of a marathon runner.
meanings.sent5: The student emulates the teacher's patience and kindness in helping others learn.
